short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and extract recipes from any website with no ads, popups, or extra text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple recipe extractor to get to the point on any recipe website. 

The recipe extractor will detect any recipe page and automatically extract the recipe in a clean, organized format.

The extension will be disabled by default. To toggle the extension, simply click on your extensions tab, select the Recipe Extractor, and click on the green enabled/red disabled button. Here, you will also find a dark mode to convert all recipes to dark mode, as well as your blacklisted websites which the recipe extractor won't run on unless you delete them from the blacklist.


If you find a website that the Recipe Extractor doesn't work on, please see the support section.
See the source code: https://github.com/bradenzingler/recipe_extractor
